files.README.md:
# Neurosift MCP Servers

MCP servers for neuroscience research tools including DANDI archive search, NWB file analysis, OpenNeuro integration, and scientific plot analysis.

## Installation

### Add the marketplace
```
/plugin marketplace add https://github.com/magland/neurosift-mcps.git
```

### Install MCP servers
```
/plugin install neurosift-tools@neurosift-mcps
/plugin install plot-vision@neurosift-mcps
```

## Documentation

For detailed documentation, see [https://github.com/flatironinstitute/neurosift/blob/main-v2/docs/mcp-neurosift-tools.md](https://github.com/flatironinstitute/neurosift/blob/main-v2/docs/mcp-neurosift-tools.md)

plugins.name: neurosift-tools
plugins.description: Neurosift MCP server for accessing DANDI archive datasets, NWB files, OpenNeuro data, and pynwb documentation

plugins.name: plot-vision
plugins.description: Scientific plot analysis MCP server using LLM vision capabilities to interpret and explain scientific graphs and figures
